Layer.description: The Layer section defines a layer which is used to generate the solution.

dryRun.description: if true the layer will not be generated.

features.description: a list of features which can be enabled/disabled on the command line.

force.description: if true the layer will be generated even if it already exists.

inputs.description: list of input files which are used to generate the layer.

meta.description: meta data about the layer which will be passed on to the template.

output.description: the output directory of the layer.

template.description: path to the template which can be either template package name or a template folder with a rules document.

layers.description: The layers section contains a list of layers which are used to generate the solution.

meta.description: The meta section contains meta data about the solution.

rootDir.description: The root directory of the solution to map all other paths to.

schema.description: The ApiGear solution specification version of this document.
